text: Gilbert Mathon (born May 7, 1941 in Vitry-en-Artois) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Somme department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pas-de-Calais Category:Politicians from Hauts-de-France Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Gilbert Mathon
